SEARCH
Package shapes

Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
shapes.Shape
shapes.Rectangle
public class Rectangle extends Shape
This shapes.Rectangle class represents a double precision shapes.Rectangle that can be drawn using the Processing library.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class shapes.Shape

    x, y

  • Constructor Details

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle()
      Initializes a default instance of a shapes.Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Initializes new instance of a shapes.Rectangle object with given dimensions. The left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of rectangle.
      y - Y-coordinate of rectangle.
      width - Width of rectangle.
      height - Height of rectangle.

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, Color color)
      Initializes new instance of a shapes.Rectangle object with given dimensions. The left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of rectangle.
      y - Y-coordinate of rectangle.
      width - Width of rectangle.
      height - Height of rectangle.
      color - Stroke color.

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, int r, int g, int b)
      Initializes new instance of a shapes.Rectangle object with given dimensions. The left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of rectangle.
      y - Y-coordinate of rectangle.
      width - Width of rectangle.
      height - Height of rectangle.
      r - Red.
      g - Green.
      b - Blue.

    • isPointInside

      public boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      Tests whether the point x, y is contained inside this rectangle.
      Specified by:
      isPointInside in class Shape
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the point.
      y - Y-coordinate of the point.
      Returns:
      true if the point x, y is contained inside this rectangle, false otherwise.

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects(Rectangle other)
      Tests whether this shapes.Rectangle intersects with the other shapes.Rectangle.
      Parameters:
      other - The other shapes.Rectangle to test intersection.
      Returns:
      True if the Rectangles intersect, false otherwise.

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects(Line other)
      Tests whether this shapes.Rectangle intersects with the shapes.Line.
      Parameters:
      other - The shapes.Line to test intersection.
      Returns:
      True if the shapes.Rectangle intersects the line, false otherwise.

    • draw

      public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws the rectangle to the given Processing PApplet. The left and right edges of the rectangle at getX() and getX() + getWidth(). The top and bottom edges are at getY() and getY() + getHeight().
      Overrides:
      draw in class Shape
      Parameters:
      marker - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the shapes.Rectangle.
      Preconditions:
      The shapes.Rectangle will be drawn with attributes previously set on the given PApplet.
      Postconditions:
      Side effect - marker is set to: marker.stroke(r, g, b), marker.fill(r, g, b)

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      Rotates the rectangle 90 degrees around the upper left corner.
